update.description:
Changelog v0.9.1 - Download progress when adding plugins. - Visual feedback in downloadable plugin list.
v0.9.0 - Added ability to download plugins into the storage. (visuals like progres bars etc aren't in yet)
v0.8.5 - Added an alert when deleting a plugin from the storage. - Added an alert after installing a plugin.
v0.8.4 - Added ability to delete installed plugins.
v0.8.3 - First public release.
